thread.section_title: LD Mountain Centre Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LD Mountain Centre | www.ldmountaincentre.com | 9 of 105
thread.title: Suzanne
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Suzanne

author: Suzanne
title: Suzanne
text: Fast delivery, the North Face Ravina range is fab, however, I have decided to change them for another colour in the range. The fit was great and the nicest jacket by far that I have tried. LD Mountain centre refunded my first order within 24 hrs. I will definitely shop with them again.
